description: This black bear's eyes ooze with dark, oily fluid, and its flesh is torn and scarred.  Its arms are gruesomely stretched and lengthened.
This black bear's eyes ooze with dark, oily fluid, and its flesh is torn and scarred, especially its bulging back and shoulders.  Its arms are gruesomely stretched and lengthened.
This black bear's eyes ooze with dark, oily fluid, and its flesh is torn and scarred.  Its nails and teeth are both longer and sharpened into dangerous looking spikes

A monstrous overgrowth of ossified tissue has replaced this zombear's rotting skin with an organic armor of dense bone.  Large clumps of black goo seep from its joints as it shambles aimlessly, with sickening crackling sounds filling the air around it.
This black bear's eyes ooze with dark, oily fluid, and its flesh is torn and scarred.  It shuffles as it walks.
